```
#classpath*:META-INF/dubbo/internal/demo.extension.activate.IActivate
group=demo.extension.activate.impl.HasAdaptive
other=demo.extension.activate.impl.OtherAdaptive
```

I test and both these two ways can work:
`RpcContext.getContext().setAttachment("dubbo.tag","groupA")` or `<dubbo:parameter key="dubbo.tag" value="groupA"/>`
Sorry `<dubbo:parameter key="dubbo.tag" value="groupA"/>` does have some problem, I just ran the wrong sample.
Can you add some unit cases?

already have this feature.
```properties
dubbo.protocol.name=dubbo
dubbo.protocol.port=-1
```

但是根据名称name注入的话，是否就失去了adaptive所具备的运行期自适应的能力了那？
http://dubbo.apache.org/zh-cn/docs/dev/SPI.html  
请查看链接中【扩展点自适应】小节

![aaaaa](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26532831/56194137-d949cf80-6064-11e9-85b9-b6a2e5573ebb.png)
```xml
<dubbo:config-center address="${dubbo.address}" namespace="yk" />
```
这应该是个bug，造成配置从错误的地方获取，导致获取不到配置，给人假象是配置未生效
这是当前的SPI机制可以增强的一点，但是从社区的角度我认为这个优先级相对要低一些，你愿意给出自己的实现吗？
I think we should add 'tag' as the first class supporting item in XML on consumer side.

请问你这里指定namespace="yk"是想达到什么目的？
`<dubbo:config-center address="${dubbo.address}" namespace="yk" />`

这样，会导致zk监听路径为：
`/yk/config/xxx`
因此这里指定的namespace需与dubbo-admin中配置保持一致，否则dubbo-admin写入的路径仍为：
`/dubbo/config/xxx`
Good to know that you are working on this feature, please keep the community posted.
Would you mind send an email to dev@dubbo.apache.org to discuss this feature first?

namespace="yk"是为了做环境隔离，跟
<dubbo:registry group="yk"/>
保持一致
